text:
THE UNIVERSITY
OF NORTH DAKOTA
RADIO STATION K F J M
April 2, 1943
University Station
Grand Forks. North Dakota
Mr. Trank E. Schooley
The National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Schooley:
In reply to your letter of March 30 I wish to advise
you that my present work schedule makes it improbable
for me to attend the convention this year. Therefore,
I see no reason why a combined meeting should not be
held at Columbus on May 1.
Very truly yours
g. L O
E.p. 0*Brien
Associate Professor of
Electrical Engineering
